original_title: 見ず知らずの金持ちゲス親父と政略結婚させられました。
overview: I wanted a young and beautiful wife. For her to give birth to an excellent child who inherited my genes. At that time, she found the perfect woman. Her female parents just seem to be in need of money. I subdued her parents with money and persuaded her. She will come to my house tomorrow.
title: For Money, I Married An Unfamiliar Rich Middle-Aged Sleazebag Of A Guy. Mako Iga
